Welcome to my 2025 Goals & Resolutions log! This page tracks my progress and intentions for the year, organized by month and week (most recent first). Each week shows the date range for easy reference.

# Goal Categories

- **Health and Fitness**: Goals related to physical well-being, with a focus on climbing.
- **Career**: Objectives focused on professional development as an AI engineer and job advancement.
- **Personal Learning and Growth**: Aspirations for blogging and learning about AI and engineering.
